channel.title: My first source+client heavenz fury
channel.description:
[size=18pt]well this is my first try i dont know if its any good but im proud off it being my first go well i used tuxscape source and client but edited alot soo this is probz good for begginers like me[/size]
[img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/7554/homeci.png[/img] this the home nothing new here just changed shops
[img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/2024/loadingl.png[/img] login changed by me
[img]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/5857/someminigames.png[/img] some of the mini games sum added by me e.g castlewars+assault
[img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/5435/moreminigames.png[/img] more mini games i added the fun pk
[img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/1488/somecustoms.png[/img] most of customs added by me thts hardly any off em theres bout 20 plus bout 17 added by me
[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/4203/pkzones.png[/img] pk zones i havnt changed anything here kept same
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/2299/lunarancient.png[/img] i added lunar and ancient spellbooks
[img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/8996/monstersj.png[/img] added a crappy training zone
[img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/4287/skillingareak.png[/img] and this is the skill zone changed and edited by me
[size=14pt]well thats basically it i chnaged abit more like xp rates and stuff nothing else hope you like it and it is my first goo soo its probz crap :P [/size]
[size=24pt]download links:-[/size] http://www.megaupload.com/?d=AULGDM1U
[size=36pt]pplease tell me what you think for a first timer [/size]

item.title: My first source+client heavenz fury
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Looks like a random server with some send frames, some npc’s spawned, and a new background.

Read full topic

item.title: My first source+client heavenz fury
item.dc:creator: @strgangster strgangster
item.description:
@strgangster wrote:

Inspirational:

I agree with the post above me, very nice for your first try. I’m not going to download because I actually hate customs in all servers, not just yours. So don’t worry. You’re getting there. Keep going mate.

True .

Read full topic
